Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays in both directions. We are moving and crews are working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays in both directions. We are moving and crews are working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
